accessibility.enterEmailAddress: Enter your email address to login to the application
accessibility.enterPassword: Enter your password to login to the application
accessibility.googleLoginHelp: Opens a new window for Google login. After successful login you will be automatically redirected back to the application.

privacy.privateAccountDescription: When you set a private account, your profile will not be visible or searchable by other Svaply users. No one will be able to find you in search or view your profile. All information including profile photo, posts, offered and sought skills, portfolio, contact details, name, location and other profile information will be hidden. This setting is suitable if you want to keep your account fully private and temporarily invisible in the app.
privacy.privateAccountMobileDescription: With a private account you are not visible or searchable. All information, photos, posts, skills, portfolio, contacts, name and location are hidden. Ideal if you want your account fully private.
privacy.publicAccountDescription: With a public account, other users can find your profile in search by name, offered or sought skills and categories. All information in your profile is displayed including profile photo, personal data, posts, portfolio, contacts and a complete overview of what you offer or seek. A public account is suitable if you want to be visible, reach other users and actively participate in the Svaply community.
privacy.publicAccountMobileDescription: With a public account others can find you by name, skills or categories. All data, photos, posts, portfolio and contacts are shown. Suitable if you want to be visible and active in the Svaply community.
privacy.privateAccountModalTitle: Do you want to switch your account to private?
privacy.publicAccountModalTitle: Do you want to switch your account to public?
